# Keyboard Shortcuts

cmd+l --> select current line

cmd+shit+l --> select all that apply

cmd+/ --> comment the whole line

cmd + p and then `back` --> select file

cmd + b --> close sidebar

cmd + g and `no.of line` --> go to custom line number

cmd + shit + `back` --> go to last edit

shift+option+down_arrow --> duplicate the line

option+up/down --> move the line

cmd+shift+s --> Source Control
cmd+shift+e --> Open Files
cmd+shift+f --> Find

> p: File utils: rename/delete etc.
